## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>U2B</u>
- **Gene Name:** U2 small nuclear ribonucleoprotein B
- **Description:**   U2 small nuclear ribonucleoprotein B;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2065742
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
